item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Pegasus to Predator – The evolution of Commercial Spyware on iOS [video] (23 points | discuss)
2. Category Theory Illustrated (16 points | discuss)
3. Pigment Mixing into Digital Painting (149 points | 33 comments)

5. The Zombocom Problem (98 points | 22 comments)

7. Rod Serling on Doomsday (12 points | 2 comments)
8. The history of twisted-pair Ethernet [video] (62 points | 6 comments)
9. Jimmy Carter has died (900 points | 472 comments)
10. Show HN: WIP NandToTetris Emulator in pure C – logic gates to ALU to CPU to PC (14 points | 4 comments)
11. The last Inca bridge master (66 points | 8 comments)
12. Little Snitch: Network Monitor and Application Firewall for macOS (145 points | 78 comments)
13. Show HN: Chorus, a Mac app that lets you chat a bunch of AIs at once (48 points | 13 comments)
14. Belgium will ban sales of disposable e-cigarettes in a first for the EU (88 points | 54 comments)
15. WebGL Fluid Simulation (381 points | 49 comments)
16. I Run LLMs Locally (274 points | 163 comments)
17. Brave Care Has Closed (26 points | 46 comments)

20. Measuring and Understanding LLM Identity Confusion (3 points | discuss)
21. 'ruthlessly imaginative' 1925 predictions for the future come true – mostly (11 points | 2 comments)
22. Faster CI with Selective Testing (15 points | 6 comments)
23. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (172 points | 16 comments)
24. Melbourne Train Control System is running on a hardware emulated PDP11 (101 points | 25 comments)
25. I was wrong about the ethics crisis (219 points | 309 comments)
26. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (340 points | 106 comments)
27. Breaking NATO Radio Encryption [video] (80 points | 20 comments)
28. Can LLMs accurately recall the Bible? (165 points | 103 comments)
29. BioTerrorism Will Save Your Life with the 4 Thieves Vinegar Collective [video] (148 points | 154 comments)
30. Stripe V2 (85 points | 35 comments)
